data.description: Handler for the NASA-Ames ASCII formats
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The NASA-Ames research group uses a set of special ASCII
    data-formats for datasubmission to NASA-Ames. These formats are now
    used in other institutions of geophysical applications, too.
    Text::NASA_Ames should be the namespace for handling the NASA_Ames
    ACII formats as described in:
    http://cloud1.arc.nasa.gov/solve/archiv/archive.tutorial.html
